name: 7drl_Chesslike
description:
Controls
wasd - single step in that direction
mouse inputs expect you to click in the bottom left of the squares sorry for the small area.
left click highlighted tile - move to it
right click highlighted tile - attack if enemy is there
o - change movement mode to rook
p - change movement mode to knight
1,2,3 to set difficulty on main screen

This is my first time attempting 7DRL and I came up with the "genius" idea of a roguelike but you are chess pieces and follow chess move rules.
This was created using DragonRuby
All art was created by me
Level generation code was written 2 weeks prior to the beginning of this jam by me.
